courses.name: Python for Houdini Artists
courses.description: Empower Houdini artists to code custom tools, automate workflows, and tackle production challenges-from Python fundamentals to advanced HDAs, MaterialX, and Solaris techniques-using practical examples for FX, asset creation, and pipeline development.

chapters.name: Week 1
chapters.description: Learn Python fundamentals in Houdini by creating practical tools-an asset batch importer and an attribute-based geometry splitter for efficient workflows.

chapters.name: Week 2
chapters.description: Dive deeper into Python with OOP-classes, modules, and functions-while exploring Houdini Packages to build your own reusable toolset.

chapters.name: Week 3
chapters.description: Use essential Python modules like os and json to construct a simple pipeline toolkit, enabling streamlined project creation and management.

chapters.name: Week 4
chapters.description: This chapter extends the project creation tool by building a project manager based on the previously created JSON file. It covers listing, enabling, disabling, and deleting projects, setting environment variables, and managing project details such as code, FPS, and save paths.

lessons.name: Project Manager Enable Disable Delete Project
lessons.description: Project Manager Enable Disable Delete Project

chapters.name: Week 5
chapters.description: Apply your skills to real-world Houdini problems by developing tools that automate repetitive tasks and batch-process geometry or data.

lessons.name: Save Tool Connection To Project Manager
lessons.description: Save Tool Connection To Project Manager

chapters.name: Week 6
chapters.description: Dive deeper into building materials, working with UDIMs.

chapters.name: Week 7
chapters.description: Create advanced tools with custom GUIs using PySide2 or PyQt5, focusing on automating material creation and texture assignment tasks.

chapters.name: Week 8
chapters.description: Integrate Python into Houdini Digital Assets and utilize Python States to craft interactive tools for dynamic, state-driven workflows.

lessons.name: Working With Parms And Parms Classes
lessons.description: Working With Parms And Parms Classes

lessons.name: HDA Camara Manager Working With Animation
lessons.description: HDA Camara Manager Working With Animation

lessons.name: HDA Camera Manager Merge Cameras And Render
lessons.description: HDA Camera Manager Merge Cameras And Render

chapters.name: Week 9
chapters.description: Explore Solaris and USD-based workflows by building Python tools that automate asset creation with LOPs for efficient scene assembly.

lessons.name: Place Highlight Guide Geometry SOP Verbs
lessons.description: Place Highlight Guide Geometry SOP Verbs

lessons.name: Place Highlight Mousewheel Menus Info Panels
lessons.description: Place Highlight Mousewheel Menus Info Panels

chapters.name: Week 10
chapters.description: Develop complex Solaris tools for programmatic camera and light setup, enhancing your USD lighting workflows with Python scripting.

lessons.name: LOPs Asset Builder Create Component Builder
lessons.description: LOPs Asset Builder Create Component Builder

lessons.name: LOPs Asset Builder Install Extra Modules Scipy
lessons.description: LOPs Asset Builder Install Extra Modules Scipy

lessons.description: LOPs Asset Builder Implementing Tex To Mtlx

lessons.description: LOPs Asset Builder Network Box Stiky Notes
